entries.title_d: While eliminating the Zynt'aia influence in the mining field located close to A'Lerris' outpost, I received a distressful call from Miss Verata herself. It seems that one of her freighters has been captured by the Zynt'aia Order. It is my duty to travel to its known location and rescue it from the hands of her--now
--enemies. I expect the resistance I meet to be extensive and dangerous. I can only hope I make it out alive with the freighter and its crew intact.
entries.title: Tatoo System: Darksing D-45 Crew
entries.thanks_3: Excellent! It makes me glad that you're on our side in this conflict.
entries.thanks_2: That was really close. Your flying skills are unmatched!
entries.thanks_1: Thank you for that, pilot! I'm glad we have you on our side.
entries.taunt_2: Never upset the Zynt'aia Order. You'll never win!
entries.rescue_phase_2: We've got out systems on-line again. We'll follow you closely. Keep enemies off us. We're still pretty weak!
entries.rescue_phase_1: Finally!! We're saved!! You must have been sent by A'Lerris!
entries.rescue_abandoned: We're so close, pilot! Don't quit on us!
entries.recovery_success: Good work, pilot. The freighter is on its way home. I'm very impressed by the way you've handled yourself.
entries.quest_location_d: I must remain in the Tatoo System for my mission. It is my directive to do so.
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the Darksing D-45 to Safety
entries.quest_escort_d: Once I've completed the docking proceedures with the Darksing D-45, I must escort it to safety. I have no doubt I'll be attacked along the way by the Zynt'aia Order. I must prepare myself.
entries.quest_dock_d: I must find the disabled Darksing D-45 and dock with it once I've found it. I can do this by getting close and enabling the docking proceedures. (Use the /dock command to dock with the freighter).
entries.panic_3: That's gonna hurt! Hey pilot! Are you taking the scenic route or something? Get back here and help us!
entries.panic_2: Oof! Help us! We're getting attacked!
entries.panic_1: Look alive, pilot! They're coming at us hard!
entries.failed_destroy: Your mission is lost, pilot! The freighter has been destroyed. It was a hard task. Understood. We must mourn for the loss of our crew.
entries.docking_started: Be still, pilot. Our men are boarding now, hoping to re-capture the freighter. Stick close.
entries.docking_complete: Good, pilot. Now, our men will re-capture the freighter and guide it back home. However, you must protect it from incoming Zynt'aia pirate attacks. No doubt, they'll try to destroy the freighter now that we've rescued it.
entries.complete: Phenomenal job, my friend! I knew we could count on you! Your mission is complete.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The freighter has come in range of our detection sensors. Travel there and rescue it before it's too late. Please, pilot. We needn't lose any more lives to this frivolous mess. I expect you to do well.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Listen closely, pilot. Soon, I will transmit the data needed to find our downed freighter. It is your job to rescue it and fly it home to safety.
entries.abort: Why are you doing this to us? We're so close to going home!
